    cfg

    cfg.Rmd

    label

    show label

    mtcars %>% 
  g2Scatter(mpg, disp, cfg = list(label=list()))

    label text style

    cfg = list(
  label = list(
    rotate=45,
    style = list(
      fill='#fc9845',
      fontSize = 18
    )
  )
)

mtcars %>% 
  g2Scatter(mpg, disp, cfg = cfg)

    label formatter

    cfg = list(
  label = list(
    formatter = htmlwidgets::JS('(v) => `[${v.mpg}, ${v.disp}]`')
  )
)
mtcars %>% 
  g2Scatter(mpg, disp, cfg = cfg)
